drivers.name: Max Verstappen
drivers.bio: Max Verstappen, born September 30, 1997, is a Dutch racing driver and three-time F1 World Champion (2021, 2022, 2023).

drivers.name: Lewis Hamilton
drivers.bio: Lewis Hamilton, born January 7, 1985, is a British driver tied for the most F1 World Championships (2008, 2014, 2015, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020).

drivers.name: Oscar Piastri
drivers.bio: Oscar Piastri, born November 13, 1999, is a British driver known for his competitive performances with McLaren.

history.description: The inaugural F1 World Championship was held, with Giuseppe Farina winning the drivers' title.
Ayrton Senna, one of F1's greatest drivers, tragically died during the San Marino Grand Prix.
Max Verstappen won his first championship in a dramatic season finale against Lewis Hamilton.
